hadiths.text: Abdul-Malik bin Abi Sulaiman narrated from 'Ata' who said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'Whoever is given something for the rest of his life, it belongs to him for as long as he lives and after he dies

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ اخْتِلاَفِ أَلْفَاظِ النَّاقِلِينَ لِخَبَرِ جَابِرٍ فِي الْعُمْرَى
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning The Different Versions Of The Report Of Jabir Concerning 'Umra
